prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features a combination of Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, Guitar, and Chromatic Percussion, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, Guitar, and Chromatic Percussion, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, Guitar, and Chromatic Percussion, Bass excluded.
